about_the_game:
Police Force - Law and Honor

A global multiplayer battle-royale game in a cartoon-style world as a police officer, soldier, or mercenary. Play in single-player mode, or show off your skills in battle royale and play with potential friends around the world in multiplayer tournaments and campaigns.



Fight as either a mercenary who fights for his honor or a soldier who fights for the law. Explore the lore of the game while you play with your friends around the world.

Gameplay: Play with friends around the world!


A global multiplayer game in a cartoon-style world as a police officer, soldier, or mercenary. Show off your skills in a battle royale. The game includes both single-player and multiplayer game features so that you can play the game by yourself, play with friends, or play with potential friends around the world.

The game has over thirty (30+) default heroes and a lot of upcoming special heroes, special event heroes, notable or popular figure characters, and potential custom heroes (influencer pledges) that you can order by funding our Kickstarter campaign.
The game also has over twenty (20+) default battlefield maps you can explore, as well as a lot of upcoming special maps, special event maps, notable or landmark maps, and potential custom maps you can order by funding our Kickstarter campaign.

Choose a side: either fight for the law or fight for your honor. Who will prevail? Find out by playing our game, which you can make possible by funding our project.










Influencer: Play with celebrities!




These celebrities have funded this game in our Kickstarter campaign. Spot your favorite celebrities in their avatars as playable characters. 🎙️

  • ✨Pledge the Influencer tier in our Kickstarter crowdfunding campaign to get your own custom hero.
  • 📧 You can also contact us through email if you have any concerns or inquiries.

Story Writer: Community-driven lore!




Play the game lore the community have collaborated to write. 📚

  • ✨Pledge the Story Writer tier in our Kickstarter crowdfunding campaign to write your own story or event in the game.
  • 📧 You can also contact us through email if you have any concerns or inquiries.

- End of description -
